name: Seventh International Conference on Advances in Computer Science and Application
content: All the accepted registered papers will be published by the Academica Press and the International Journal of Electrical, Electronics & Computer Science Engineering (IJEECSE), and will be submitted to possible indexing in all the major indexing services like Proquest, EI, ISI Web of Science, DBLP, IET Inspec, Scopus and etc. IJEECSE is a UGC Approved and recipient of Publication Excellence Award 2016 & 2017 in Engineering & Technology. Impact Factor of IJEECSE: 2.165 (2014), 3.490 (2015), 3.952 (2016) and 4.255 (2017)
